push_intro_chores: Nice to see you with us. It’s now time to give out some chores to your kids. Maybe it’s worth €0.50 to skip the dishes tonight? :-)
push_intro_make_deposit: It’s time to make your children’s cash digital. Make a deposit into the piggy bank to make your kids grow intellectually
push_reminder_give_chores: Don’t forget to give your children chores so that they can make extra money and become financially smarter. Find example tasks in the app
push_suggest_task: You can now suggest tasks for your parents to give you. Select Tasks in the app, then Suggest Task. This way you can get some extra money

push_connect_child_help_develop_economic: When you connect to your child you help them develop their financial skills
push_children_financial_smarter: Did you know that children can easily become financially smarter! Learn how!
trustly_manual_transaction_email_subject: Are you sure, you just sent {transaction.str_value} to {transaction.child.name}?
trustly_manual_transaction_email_body: Because you have enabled simple transfers from your account to the {transaction.child.name} account that do not require a Mobile BankID account, we just wanted to make sure that you were just making a transfer. If so, you can ignore this email. If you do not, you'll need to check if someone has access to your phone. Please note that simple transfers can only be made between the accounts that you have previously linked with BankID and our Trustly partner , and you can only send max 2000kr per transfer and day. You can see your linked accounts in the app under the Downloads tab.
push_parent_not_giving_chores: Get your kids to help at home! Give a task to your child!

push_suggest_chore: No way to earn your own money? Suggest a chore!
